TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRangeValueProvider

summary.span: 公开一些方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问可在一定范围内设置为值的控件。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be set to a value within a range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上控件模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定控件的值是否是只读的。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.

value.span: 如果值为只读的，则为 ；如果可以修改它，则为 。

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示的控件不是只读的此方法的实现。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that is not read-only. summary.span: 获取一个值，当发生大更改时（例如按下了 Page Down 键），会将 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

span.span: Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the property when a large change is made, such as with the PAGE DOWN key.

value.span: 支持的控件或为 null 的显著更改值 (在 Visual Basic 中) 如果该控件不支持。

span.span: The large-change value supported by the control or null ( in Visual Basic) if the control does not support .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValue(float64 value) cil managed

span.span: Sets the value of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置的实际值取决于控件的实现。The actual value set depends on the control implementation. 控件可能舍入请求`value`上移或下移。The control may round the requested `value` up or down. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法对于自定义控件的一种可能的实现。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control. 自定义控件显示其基的颜色的 alpha 值通过其范围值。The custom control displays its range value through the alpha value of its base color. [!code-csharp[UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip#SetValue](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip/CSharp/RangeValueFragment.cs#setvalue)] [!code-vb[UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip#SetValue](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip/visualbasic/rangevaluefragment.vb#setvalue)]

exception.span: 当 小于控件的最小值或大于控件的最大值时。

span.span: When is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法的自定义控件的实现。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a custom control. 此示例的目的，自定义控件显示通过其基础颜色的 alpha 设置的值。For the purposes of this sample, the custom control displays the value through the alpha setting of its base color.
